languages.text: "Тише, Кибелла. Ты тень. Ты щит. Ты клинок. Так будь ими".
"Peace, Kibellah. You are the shield. You are the shadow. You are the blade. So be them."
languages.original_text: "Тише, Кибелла. Ты тень. Ты щит. Ты клинок. Так будь ими".

traits.locale_text: "Peace, Kibellah. You are the shadow. You are the shield. You are the blade. So be them."
"Peace, Kibellah. You are the shadow. You are the shield. You are the blade. So be them."
"Peace, Kibellah. You are the shadow. You are the shield. You are the blade. So be them."
"Peace, Kibellah. You are the shadow. You are the shield. You are the blade. So be them."
"Peace, Kibellah. You are the shield. You are the shadow. You are the blade. So be them."
"Peace, Kibellah. You are the shield. You are the shadow. You are the blade. So be them."

languages.text: "Friede, Kibellah. Ihr seid der Schild. Ihr seid der Schatten. Ihr seid die Klinge. Seid sie also."
languages.original_text: "Peace, Kibellah. You are the shield. You are the shadow. You are the blade. So be them."

traits.locale_text: "Friede, Kibellah. Ihr seid der Schild. Ihr seid der Schatten. Ihr seid die Klinge. Seid sie also."

languages.text: «Paz, Kibellah. Eres el escudo. Eres la sombra. Eres el arma. Cumple con tu propósito».
languages.original_text: "Peace, Kibellah. You are the shield. You are the shadow. You are the blade. So be them."

traits.locale_text: «Paz, Kibellah. Eres el escudo. Eres la sombra. Eres el arma. Cumple con tu propósito».

languages.text: 「落ち着け、キベラ。お前は盾である。お前は影である。お前は刃である。そうであれ」
languages.original_text: "Peace, Kibellah. You are the shield. You are the shadow. You are the blade. So be them."

traits.locale_text: 「落ち着け、キベラ。お前は盾である。お前は影である。お前は刃である。そうであれ」

languages.text: “安静，绮贝菈。你是坚盾，你是影子，你是利刃。既然如此，担任好你的角色吧。”
languages.original_text: "Peace, Kibellah. You are the shield. You are the shadow. You are the blade. So be them."

traits.locale_text: “安静，绮贝菈。你是坚盾，你是影子，你是利刃。既然如此，担任好你的角色吧。”

languages.text: « Paix, Kibellah. Vous êtes tout à la fois le bouclier, l'ombre et la lame. Abandonnez-vous corps et âme à votre sacerdoce. »
languages.original_text: "Peace, Kibellah. You are the shield. You are the shadow. You are the blade. So be them."

traits.locale_text: « Paix, Kibellah. Vous êtes tout à la fois le bouclier, l'ombre et la lame. Abandonnez-vous corps et âme à votre sacerdoce. »

languages.text: "Sakin ol Kibellah. Sen kalkansın, gölgesin, kılıçsın. Bu şekilde davranmalısın."
languages.original_text: "Peace, Kibellah. You are the shield. You are the shadow. You are the blade. So be them."
